content: pride headband easy size gauge gauge actual measurements across front 9 stitches and 10 row to 4 cm 1 58 in 4 5cm height x 22 5cm width measure over pattern using a 4mm uk 8 - us g/6 crochet hook and working in single you will need crochet stitches it s important to check your ❤ stylecraft special dk acrylic yarn x1 of gauge gauge before starting as working in each ball the wrong gauge could result in your work see the yarn chart below for the yarn you need for the flag you want to make being the wrong size before beginning ❤ 4mm uk 8 - us g/6 crochet hook crochet a 9 stitches and 10 row gauge ❤ darning needle swatch square and measure your gauge if ❤ scissors there are more stitches and row than stated try again using a thicker hook if there are less abbreviations stitches and row than stated try again using a this pattern is in us crochet terms thinner hook chain- chain s st- stitch single_crochet- single_crochet uk double_crochet slip_stitch s - slip_stitch * *- repeat
